video.title: Charmed
video.synopsis: After a trio of sisters discover an ancient text in their mansion attic, revealing they possess latent supernatural powers, mischief and drama ensue.

episodes.synopsis: Sisters Prue and Piper Halliwell have recently moved into their dead grandmother's old victorian home in the San Francisco hills.
episodes.title: Something Wicca This Way Comes

episodes.synopsis: A good-looking man kidnaps young, beautiful women and sucks their youth and beauty out of them to keep his own youth. Now he has designs on Phoebe.
episodes.title: I've Got You Under My Skin

episodes.synopsis: The Halliwell sisters' long lost father unexpectedly turns up with intentions of getting the Book of Shadows out of their house.
episodes.title: Thank You for Not Morphing

episodes.synopsis: After being killed by gang thugs, Mark becomes a ghost whose soul is forfeit if Yama, the demon who confiscates souls for hell, gets him first.
episodes.title: Dead Man Dating

episodes.synopsis: After Piper and Phoebe cast a spell to dream up romantic interests, the dream sorcerer tries to get back at Prue after she rebuffs him at a club.
episodes.title: Dream Sorcerer

episodes.synopsis: With Phoebe's help, Piper caters a wedding and discovers that the groom is under a spell that was cast by the bride.
episodes.title: The Wedding from Hell

episodes.synopsis: A lonely young teen attempts to get friendly with the sisters after being possessed by Kali, a demon bent on gaining the girls' powers from them.
episodes.title: The Fourth Sister

episodes.synopsis: Prue casts a 24-hour truth spell in order to determine whether Andy will still be attracted to her if he finds out she's a witch.
episodes.title: The Truth Is Out There... and It Hurts

episodes.synopsis: After Rex gets Prue a locket that harbors the evil warlock Matthew, Matthew takes Prue's powers and sets out for the other sisters.
episodes.title: The Witch Is Back

episodes.synopsis: Rex and Hannah set out to destroy the sisters Halliwell and frame Prue for murder.
episodes.title: Wicca Envy

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe's old flame, Clay, comes to town after he and his partners steal a valuable urn that is guarded by a demon.
episodes.title: Feats of Clay

episodes.synopsis: After Piper is almost killed by a beast, she begins a strange transformation, developing frighteningly similar traits to her attacker.
episodes.title: The Wendigo

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of another Friday the 13th, the sisters learn of a demon who kills witches after discovering their deepest fears.
episodes.title: From Fear to Eternity

episodes.synopsis: Prue tries to help a young boy, who's received his mother's witch powers after two thugs kidnap him to use his powers for their evil gain.
episodes.title: Secrets and Guys

episodes.synopsis: An earthquake unearths a shadowy, evil Woogy, who promptly takes over the gasman working on the Halliwell premises.
episodes.title: Is There a Woogy in the House?

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous mortal uses a crystal sword to suck powers out of people and targets Prue as his next victim.
episodes.title: Which Prue Is It, Anyway?

episodes.synopsis: After a run-in with a demon who's responsible for the death of the sisters' mother, Prue, Piper and Phoebe are transported back to the 1970s.
episodes.title: That '70s Episode

episodes.synopsis: Prue tries to help Brendan, whose two brothers are evil warlocks attempting to convert him and form the dangerous Evil Charmed Ones.
episodes.title: When Bad Warlocks Go Good

episodes.synopsis: After the Halliwell sisters witness the kidnapping of Piper's friend's son, they discover it's the work of the Grimlocks.
episodes.title: Out of Sight

episodes.synopsis: Prue and Phoebe discover a long-dead convict has been brought to life as a ghost and is murdering anyone who had anything to do with his conviction.
episodes.title: The Power of Two

episodes.synopsis: White-Lighter Leo returns to help rescue Daisy, a young woman on her way to becoming a White Lighter herself.
episodes.title: Love Hurts

episodes.synopsis: After repeated, unsuccessful attempts at trying to get to the Charmed Ones, Rodriguez is aided by time sorcerer Tempus Fugit.
episodes.title: Déjà Vu All Over Again

episodes.synopsis: On their first anniversary of becoming witches, the sisters face a cloven-hoofed demon that steals the Book of Shadows and undoes spells they've cast.
episodes.title: Witch Trial

episodes.synopsis: Pheobe has a vivid premonition foretelling her own death -- burned at the stake for killing a man with her powers -- in the year 2009.
episodes.title: Morality Bites

episodes.synopsis: Prue tries to save a man trapped inside a painting only to get trapped herself. Piper ends up inside the painting, too.
episodes.title: The Painted World

episodes.synopsis: Leo lures the manager of Dishwalla to P3, aware that the manager has made a pact with a demon that grants him fame and fortune.
episodes.title: The Devil's Music

episodes.synopsis: When Phoebe starts to have visions and feelings of a seductress who kills only men, the Charmed Ones cast a spell to find out who the demon is.
episodes.title: She's a Man, Baby, a Man!

episodes.synopsis: When two hikers accidentally free the evil witch Tuatha, she sends her enchanted serpent to find her wand.
episodes.title: That Old Black Magic

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe has a premonition that Collectors, demons that can suck a brain empty, are after a patient in the hospital where she volunteers.
episodes.title: They're Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: The sisters face the demon that killed their mom when it decides to start killing innocents again, 20 years after her death.
episodes.title: P3 H2O

episodes.synopsis: Prue goes undercover to find out who sent an assassin to kill them and other witches on Friday the 13th.
episodes.title: Ms. Hellfire

episodes.synopsis: When Cupid has his magic ring of love stolen by Drazi, the demon of hate, he visits Phoebe asking for her help.
episodes.title: Heartbreak City

episodes.synopsis: While at the police station with Darryl, Phoebe touches an abandoned baby and has a premonition of a ghost killing the baby's father.
episodes.title: Reckless Abandon

episodes.synopsis: While slicing up smuggled fruit at P3, Piper collapses and is rushed to the San Francisco Memorial Hospital.
episodes.title: Awakened

episodes.synopsis: On Valentine's Day eve, Phoebe's three college mates buy a witchcraft book to cast a spell seeking dates and transform animals into humans.
episodes.title: Animal Pragmatism

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe is faced with her dark past when her previous life comes back to haunt her.
episodes.title: Pardon My Past

episodes.synopsis: While in prison, Bane Jessup is attacked by two demons. He escapes, while one of the demons is killed and the other loses his weapon.
episodes.title: Give Me a Sign

episodes.synopsis: Piper tells Leo that she loves him, but she can't tell Dan for a week, since he is traveling.
episodes.title: Murphy's Luck

episodes.synopsis: Three old ladies summon the demon of vanity Kryto and promise to resurrect him in exchange for health, beauty and youth.
episodes.title: How to Make a Quilt Out of Americans

episodes.synopsis: When the Demon of Illusion threatens Prue and Phoebe at home, the sisters chase him and he hides in a movie theater.
episodes.title: Chick Flick

episodes.synopsis: While studying for finals at the library, Phoebe meets Charlene, who is researching demons for her thesis.
episodes.title: Ex Libris

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Curtis Williamson, who treated Piper's fever, begins researching the effects of the Halliwell sisters' blood in three monkeys.
episodes.title: Astral Monkey

episodes.synopsis: San Francisco is in chaos, with riots everywhere. Piper and Leo find a mysterious man in the middle of it.
episodes.title: Apocalypse, Not

episodes.synopsis: A genie, employed by a Dragon Warlock to steal the Halliwells' powers, offers to grant each sister one wish for whatever they most desire.
episodes.title: Be Careful What You Witch For

episodes.synopsis: Prue and Phoebe wonder if Piper will ever return from "up there" with Leo, and the sisters become involved in a court case crawling with demons.
episodes.title: The Honeymoon's Over

episodes.synopsis: The sisters must find a way to break a curse that turns a man into an owl by day and his girlfriend into a wolf by night.
episodes.title: Magic Hour

episodes.synopsis: Piper has a nightmare about Leo and tells Prue that The Powers That Be have ordered Leo to disappear from her life.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time

episodes.synopsis: The sisters are sent back in time on Halloween to save a baby from being born into the clutches of evil.
episodes.title: All Halliwell's Eve

episodes.synopsis: After the manor is burglarized, Prue, Phoebe and Piper become obsessed with learning more about the elusive evil force that is hunting them.
episodes.title: Sight Unseen

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe and Piper try to save Prue after a spell horribly backfires and Prue is given the unwanted gift of feeling all the pain in the world.
episodes.title: Primrose Empath

episodes.synopsis: Cole uses petty anger between Prue, Phoebe and Piper to break their bond and destroy the very foundation of their powers.
episodes.title: Power Outage

episodes.synopsis: After Prue, Phoebe and Piper learn that Cole is the demon that has been trying to kill them, Phoebe faces a tough decision.
episodes.title: Sleuthing with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Piper is consumed with insecurities over her impending 10-year high school reunion and becomes possessed by a she-demon.
episodes.title: Coyote Piper

episodes.synopsis: Prue has a melody stuck in her head. When she hears a girl humming the same tune, she finds that it belongs to the ice cream truck.
episodes.title: We All Scream for Ice Cream

episodes.synopsis: The sisters must stop a warlock from executing his plan to steal specific powers from witches in his attempt to kill every Whitelighter in the world.
episodes.title: Blinded by the Whitelighter

episodes.synopsis: When Prue learns that one of her ex-boyfriends is being courted by the dark side, the sisters risk their lives in an underworld wrestling ring.
episodes.title: Wrestling with Demons

episodes.synopsis: When a shapeshifting warlock tricks Prue into a shotgun wedding, Phoebe and Piper are lured to the dark side and relish their new evil powers.
episodes.title: Bride and Gloom

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe becomes psychically and physically linked with the violent past of an Old West ghost town with horses, petticoats, cowboys and six-shooters.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad & the Cursed

episodes.synopsis: Piper is praying for a demon-free wedding day, but Prue's astral self has other plans as dreams take her into a wild world without rules.
episodes.title: Just Harried

episodes.synopsis: Prue is tired of losing her battle to save innocents, and in her effort to fight off the Angel of Death, she has to turn her back on a dying soul.
episodes.title: Death Takes a Halliwell

episodes.synopsis: Piper and Leo feel a lack of privacy and decide to move to their own apartment.
episodes.title: Pre-Witched

episodes.synopsis: A demon wielding the seven deadly sins uses his powers against the Charmed Ones.
episodes.title: Sin Francisco

episodes.synopsis: Cole joins the good fight when he goes undercover in an underworld brotherhood to help Prue, Phoebe, Piper and Leo learn more about the evil.
episodes.title: The Demon Who Came in from the Cold

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe is worried for Cole, who stays in with a demon Brotherhood, but the danger turns dire when Cole's mentor plots to bring out his evil side.
episodes.title: Exit Strategy

episodes.synopsis: Piper is learning to control her new power, while Phoebe writes in the Book of Shadows about Cole.
episodes.title: Look Who's Barking

episodes.synopsis: Prue and Piper bring Dr. Griffiths to their home to save him from The Source's assassin, Shax.
episodes.title: All Hell Breaks Loose

episodes.synopsis: Piper and Phoebe are faced with the loss of Prue, while The Source discovers why the Power of Three has not been severed by Prue's death.
episodes.title: Charmed Again: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Piper is full of anger at the death of Prue and vanquishes as many demons as possible, jeopardizing her life as well as Phoebe's and Cole's.
episodes.title: Hell Hath No Fury

episodes.synopsis: Paige creates havoc when she mixes a potion that switches her body with Phoebe's and must battle evil that has opened a portal between two worlds.
episodes.title: Enter the Demon

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a creepy old house, Paige involves the Charmed Ones with a demon named Gamil and are all shrunk to a height of five inches.
episodes.title: Size Matters

episodes.synopsis: Paige casts a spell that brings a prince from one of her past lives into the 21st century. Her past (evil) self follows and trouble ensues.
episodes.title: A Knight to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe and Paige must work quickly before Piper is tricked into giving up all of their powers to The Source.
episodes.title: Brain Drain

episodes.synopsis: Paige brings home a baby robot and gives it to Piper and Leo to see if they can handle having a baby and vanquishing demons.
episodes.title: Black as Cole

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones must protect the muses from a warlock who traps them in a magical ring to use their inspiration for evil.
episodes.title: Muse to My Ears

episodes.synopsis: Paige blames herself for her parents the death in a car wreck and must confront her painful past.
episodes.title: A Paige from the Past

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe is serving on a jury in a murder case, and she is convinced that the defendant is guilty -- until she has a premonition of the real killer.
episodes.title: Trial by Magic

episodes.synopsis: Cole proposes again to Phoebe, only now as a 'normal' human, and accepts Paige's proposal to come work for social services.
episodes.title: Lost and Bound

episodes.synopsis: When The Seer foresees the demise of The Source by the Halliwell sisters, he decides to break the covenant between good and evil.
episodes.title: Charmed and Dangerous

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe has a strange feeling about Cole, and she casts a spell to know whether she should marry him or not.
episodes.title: The Three Faces of Phoebe

episodes.synopsis: The Seer foresees something powerful in Phoebe and Cole's future, and The Source must bring something important to them to the evil side.
episodes.title: Marry-Go-Round

episodes.synopsis: The Seer blends a potion in chocolates for Cole to give to Phoebe and conceive a son in the full moon night.
episodes.title: The Fifth Halliwheel

episodes.synopsis: After 60 years of searching, two ghosts who fought with Leo in WWII come after him seeking revenge for old wounds.
episodes.title: Saving Private Leo

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones fight a vampire queen who kidnaps Paige and tries to turn her against Piper and Phoebe.
episodes.title: Bite Me

episodes.synopsis: Piper and Paige team up with a magical wizard to stop the coronation of a new Source, not realizing that the new head of the Underworld is Cole.
episodes.title: We're Off to See the Wizard

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe is irritated with the lack of attention from Cole and destroys five of his demons in a couple of days.
episodes.title: Long Live the Queen

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe's unborn baby shows signs of demonic powers as it takes control of her body and attacks Paige and anyone else who might be a threat to it.
episodes.title: Womb Raider

episodes.synopsis: The Angel of Destiny comes to the Halliwell manor and proposes to remove the powers of the sisters as a reward for vanquishing The Source.
episodes.title: Witch Way Now?

episodes.synopsis: Paige, Leo and Piper try to track the mermaid Phoebe, who is eventually captured by the demon who made the deal with the sea-hag for immortality.
episodes.title: A Witch's Tail: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: An Evil Witch kills the keeper of the Fairy Tales and forces the sisters to relive them.
episodes.title: Happily Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Cole and Phoebe are lured to their death by a Siren, and Piper and Leo have their powers switched by their unborn child.
episodes.title: Siren Song

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones are turned into superheroes by a student who can bring his drawings to life.
episodes.title: Witches in Tights

episodes.synopsis: The blind demon Orin and his son Cree kill Shuvani -- Romanian gypsies -- and steal their eyes to make Orin see again and get the evil eye.
episodes.title: The Eyes Have It

episodes.synopsis: Barbas, the Demon of Fear, returns. He steals Cole's powers and again battles the Charmed Ones, using their darkest fears against them.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Demon

episodes.synopsis: By repeatedly saving the life of her boyfriend, Phoebe opens a portal allowing a warlock to pass into the present on a mission from future Cole.
episodes.title: A Witch in Time

episodes.synopsis: Paige is given her first charge as a Whitelighter: her real father, Sam.
episodes.title: Sam I Am

episodes.synopsis: When a demon kidnaps Phoebe to provide a body for the spirit of his dead lover, Cole tries to save her by trading Paige for Phoebe.
episodes.title: Y Tu Mummy Tambien

episodes.synopsis: Cole uses non-magical legal means to manipulate the sisters into giving him ownership of the manor and access to the Nexus.
episodes.title: The Importance of Being Phoebe

episodes.synopsis: After realizing that he will never get Phoebe back and getting tired of her sisters' attempts at vanquishing him, Cole agrees to become an avatar.
episodes.title: Centennial Charmed

episodes.synopsis: After the sisters have some remnant evil spirits removed from Halliwell Manor, the witch doctor cripples them with an obsession curse.
episodes.title: House Call

episodes.synopsis: After a demon kills the sandman and uses his sleep dust to cause the Charmed Ones' nightmares to come to life, the sisters must face their fears.
episodes.title: Sand Francisco Dreamin'

episodes.synopsis: The sorcerer Cronyn has waited for the rare natural phenomenon aurora borealis to set in motion a devious plan to eliminate the Charmed sisters.
episodes.title: The Day the Magic Died

episodes.synopsis: A Crone plots with other demons to steal Wyatt and his power, but Wyatt demonstrates that he can protect himself.
episodes.title: Baby's First Demon

episodes.synopsis: When leprechauns start getting killed by a magic-stealing demon, they help the Charmed Ones fight the demon by granting them good luck.
episodes.title: Lucky Charmed

episodes.synopsis: While visiting a marriage counselor, Piper casts a spell to allow her and Leo to literally see their past together.
episodes.title: Cat House

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones help two nymphs rid themselves of a demon who was after the pond they guarded.
episodes.title: Nymphs Just Wanna Have Fun

episodes.synopsis: While the sisters, Leo and Wyatt are enjoying a family trip to a carnival, the Crone plots to steal the senses of the Charmed Ones.
episodes.title: Sense & Sense Ability

episodes.synopsis: The matriarchs of the Halliwell line are summoned for the Wicanning of Wyatt, but the Necromancer demon is trying to absorb their magical powers.
episodes.title: Necromancing the Stone

episodes.synopsis: The sisters are visited by a Whitelighter from the future, who informs them that a new threat, the Titans, have been awakened.
episodes.title: Oh My Goddess: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Piper seems strangely unaffected by Leo's disappearance, so Paige casts a spell that backfires and causes Piper to lose her memory.
episodes.title: Valhalley of the Dolls: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: When Wyatt inadvertently brings a dragon to life, the Cleaners spring into action to protect the magic from being exposed.
episodes.title: Forget Me...Not

episodes.synopsis: When three evil sisters magically steal their identities, Piper, Phoebe and Paige must convince Chris that they are the real Charmed Ones.
episodes.title: The Power of Three Blondes

episodes.synopsis: Paige becomes involved in a dangerous feud between two magical families.
episodes.title: Love's a Witch

episodes.synopsis: To teach the Charmed Ones a lesson, Chris traps them in individual magical realities where their secret desires come true.
episodes.title: My Three Witches

episodes.synopsis: Paige's new boss is killed by a demon right in front of her. When she investigates, she discovers that he sold his soul to the demon who killed him.
episodes.title: Soul Survivor

episodes.synopsis: The Lady of the Lake contacts the sisters and pleads for help. They suddenly find themselves the guardians of the Sword in the Stone.
episodes.title: Sword and the City

episodes.synopsis: After the Sisters kill a Manticore and find her baby, they try to decide what to do with the human-looking infant demon.
episodes.title: Little Monsters

episodes.synopsis: This episode centers on Chris, the mysterious new whitelighter and why he has come back from the future.
episodes.title: Chris-Crossed

episodes.synopsis: Paige finds herself transported back in time by a pair of Grams' boots to an era of free-love and freely practiced magic where Paige really fits in.
episodes.title: Witchstock

episodes.synopsis: After Piper has doubts about the future, Paige and Phoebe conjure up "Mr. Right" as Piper's birthday present.
episodes.title: Prince Charmed

episodes.synopsis: Richard, Paige's boyfriend, casts a spell to rid himself of bad karma and accidentally infects Phoebe with the bad karma of Mata Hari.
episodes.title: Used Karma

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones learn about Magic School and have to determine which magical student has summoned the Headless Horseman, who is beheading teachers.
episodes.title: The Legend of Sleepy Halliwell

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe is turned into a Genie, and Chris tries to use Phoebe's power to grant wishes to get Piper and Leo back together.
episodes.title: I Dream of Phoebe

episodes.synopsis: A Darklighter accidentally sends Leo and Piper to another plane of existence.
episodes.title: The Courtship of Wyatt's Father

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe accidentally casts a spell that reverts all of their former high school classmates to their teenage personalities.
episodes.title: Hyde School Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Spider Demons kidnap Piper, infect Chris and cause him to mutate into a spider.
episodes.title: Spin City

episodes.synopsis: The Cleaners implicate Darryl in a murder after Phoebe and Paige accidentally expose their magic to the world.
episodes.title: Crimes & Witch Demeanors

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious "demon" is using the Charmed Ones' spells and potions to vanquish demons.
episodes.title: A Wrong Day's Journey into Right

episodes.synopsis: The sisters and Chris unknowingly take part in a demonic reality TV show in which they are the targets and their powers are the prize.
episodes.title: Witch Wars

episodes.synopsis: Gideon sends Chris and Leo to a mirrored world where evil prevails, and Phoebe and Paige travel to the parallel universe to rescue them.
episodes.title: It's a Bad, Bad, Bad, Bad World: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe decides to take a sabbatical from work, so Elise hires a ghost writer for the column. But Phoebe isn't happy because her stand-in's a man.
episodes.title: A Call to Arms

episodes.synopsis: When a Magic School student summons Lady Godiva, the entire status of women changes in the Charmed Ones' reality.
episodes.title: The Bare Witch Project

episodes.synopsis: Grams puts a spell on her grandchildren to stop their sibling rivalry and inadvertently reverts the sisters back to bickering teenagers.
episodes.title: Cheaper by the Coven

episodes.synopsis: When Paige encounters the pirate Captain Black Jack Cutting, who is searching for the Fountain of Youth, she's cursed and turned into an old woman.
episodes.title: Charrrmed!

episodes.synopsis: Trying to stop a murderous demon, Paige casts a spell that blocks all death. The Angel of Death turns Piper in a collector of souls.
episodes.title: Styx Feet Under

episodes.synopsis: A new threat from a completely unexpected front is attacking innocents when a blue moon occurs. Phoebe sorts out her feelings for Leslie.
episodes.title: Once in a Blue Moon

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe convinces Leo to go on a vision quest, in which Chris guides him through the important moments in his life. He is then visited by the Avatars.
episodes.title: Someone to Witch Over Me

episodes.synopsis: While trying to solve a murder at Magic School, Paige and Agent Brody are sucked into an unfinished 1930s gangster novel.
episodes.title: Charmed Noir

episodes.synopsis: After Piper learns that Leo has become an Avatar, Paige and Phoebe seek out help from Kyle.
episodes.title: There's Something About Leo

episodes.synopsis: The Seer agrees to cooperate with the Avatars and the Charmed Ones by helping them find powerful demons if they make her human.
episodes.title: Witchness Protection

episodes.synopsis: While Paige takes Kyle back to the 1980s to show him how his parents really died, Phoebe tries to show Piper a better world.
episodes.title: Ordinary Witches

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones join their powers with the Avatars' to bring about the world they have promised, where there is neither good nor evil.
episodes.title: Extreme Makeover World Edition

episodes.synopsis: The utopia brought on by the Avatars comes with a price too high for Leo, who joins with Zankou to stop the Avatars.
episodes.title: Charmageddon

episodes.synopsis: The newest professor hired by Paige at Magic School is an ex-demon that comes with an interesting life story.
episodes.title: Carpe Demon

episodes.synopsis: Darryl asks the sisters to help his friend, who he believes is possessed, and Phoebe is sent back to the late 1800s along with Drake.
episodes.title: Show Ghouls

episodes.synopsis: Attacked by demons and facing the loss of Leo, Piper fights to stay alive with a little help from an old "friend." Drake's life ends at midnight.
episodes.title: The Seven Year Witch

episodes.synopsis: When Zankou has his underworld henchman attack the Manor, Wyatt shrinks his parents -- confining them to a doll house in the attic to protect them.
episodes.title: Scry Hard

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones must recover Pandora's Box when it falls in the hands of a shape-shifting demon who intends to spread its contents around the world.
episodes.title: Little Box of Horrors

episodes.synopsis: With plans to use the power of the Charmed Ones to kill the servants of her enemy, a soul-swapper demon exchanges her soul with Phoebe's.
episodes.title: Freaky Phoebe

episodes.synopsis: Viccus, a demon who possesses the power to corrupt children through cursed toys, tries to turn little Wyatt into an evil being.
episodes.title: Imaginary Fiends

episodes.synopsis: Zankou forces the sisters to face the innocents that they have not been able to save over the past several years.
episodes.title: Death Becomes Them

episodes.synopsis: Zankou has stolen the Book of Shadows, and the Charmed Ones start the final battle to stop him and retrieve the books.
episodes.title: Something Wicca This Way Goes

episodes.synopsis: After being presumed dead, the Halliwell sisters begin their demon-free existence with new identities.
episodes.title: Still Charmed and Kicking

episodes.synopsis: Witches from Magic School keep disappearing and reappearing insane. Billie notes a parallel and tells Paige the kids are being driven mad.
episodes.title: Malice in Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: When Piper goes for a job interview, she's shocked to learn that her assumed identity was that of a woman wanted for murder.
episodes.title: Run, Piper, Run

episodes.synopsis: Wyatt's school play brings out the competitive nature in Piper when her hand-sewn costume is criticized by a Stepford-like mother.
episodes.title: Desperate Housewitches

episodes.synopsis: Problems occur when Agent Murphy sees Billie use her powers to save an innocent. Billie also casts a spell to make Phoebe happy.
episodes.title: Rewitched

episodes.synopsis: Billie is determined to kill a particular demon, but she can't when confronted by memories of when her sister was kidnapped on Halloween.
episodes.title: Kill Billie: Vol. 1

episodes.synopsis: Paige's father returns to ask for her help with a demon who has a fetish for being behind the camera.
episodes.title: The Lost Picture Show

episodes.synopsis: While searching through Homeland Security's cold case files, Billie discovers a belt that gives her superpowers.
episodes.title: Battle of the Hexes

episodes.synopsis: Agent Murphy calls upon the sisters to help capture a demon who has been infected with a government-created virus.
episodes.title: Hulkus Pocus

episodes.synopsis: Piper is visited by the Angel of Death, who warns her to prepare for the upcoming death of Leo.
episodes.title: Vaya Con Leos

episodes.synopsis: Billie discovers she has a new power when she accidentally turns her parents into a couple of sophisticated assassins.
episodes.title: Mr. & Mrs. Witch

episodes.synopsis: Paige and Henry are held hostage in a bank by a mortal who is controlled by demons.
episodes.title: Payback's a Witch

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe moves on with her life when she signs a lease for an apartment, and Paige decides to tell Henry she's a witch.
episodes.title: Repo Manor

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of the Chinese New Year, Piper and Billie get a sign they think will help bring Leo back. Instead, they find and disrupt a demon battle.
episodes.title: 12 Angry Zen

episodes.synopsis: Billie and the Charmed Ones deal with Christy's return, while a surprise suitor appears to ask for Paige's hand in marriage.
episodes.title: The Last Temptation of Christy

episodes.synopsis: Piper organizes an engagement party for Paige and Henry, but the wedding is put in jeopardy when the couple begins to get cold feet.
episodes.title: Engaged and Confused

episodes.synopsis: Students from Leo's magic school are being hunted by demons, and they arrive at the manor asking for help.
episodes.title: Generation Hex

episodes.synopsis: Coop tries to hook up Phoebe with someone else but realizes he loves her. Piper tracks down killer demons.
episodes.title: The Torn Identity

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting that Billie and Christy are the "Ultimate Power," Phoebe and Piper formulate a plan that will provide answers they need to get Leo back.
episodes.title: The Jung and the Restless

episodes.synopsis: Convinced the Charmed Ones are too self-involved, Billie and Christy team up to destroy their reputations in the magical community.
episodes.title: Gone With the Witches

episodes.synopsis: The Charmed Ones find themselves stuck in the Underworld, attempting to restore the reputations that Billie and Christy tarnished.
episodes.title: Kill Billie: Vol. 2

episodes.synopsis: Piper, with the help of Coop, must travel back in time to change the events that lead to the deaths of her sisters.
episodes.title: Forever Charmed
